fields.name: ActiveSARequestsTitle
fields.fieldText:
The following active SA Requests were found where {!Final_Patient_Name} is the patient & {!Drug_Name} is the drug:


{!ActiveSARequestInformation}

fields.name: NoResultsMessageTitle
fields.fieldText:
There are NO ACTIVE SA Requests where

{!Final_Patient_Name} is the patient and

{!Drug_Name} is the drug

fields.name: ExitDisplay
fields.fieldText: There might be a possiblity this case is a duplicate, do you wish to continue creating the SA request case:

fields.name: Provider_Summary
fields.fieldText:
Provider Details

Provider Identifier: {!Get_Provider_Record.Provider_Identifier__c}

Provider Name: {!ODRPrescriber.FirstName} {!ODRPrescriber.LastName}

Provider Type: {!ODRPrescriber.Provider_Type__pc}

Provider Date of Birth: {!ODRPrescriber.PersonBirthdate}

fields.name: Provider_Summary_Null
fields.fieldText: Provider information was not found on Salesforce and will be created automatically on Salesforce

fields.name: Submitter_Summary
fields.fieldText:

fields.name: Submitter_Summary_Null
